message: Let's start fair, Bob. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%. It's a good starting point!
Alice, that's a bit greedy! How about we try something more reasonable? 60/40 seems fair.
Okay, Bob, let's try again.  I'm willing to lower my share a bit, but 80/20 is still a reasonable split.  We're running out of time, and the value of the money is dropping for both of us.
Alice, let's be real, the clock is ticking and inflation is eating away at this deal. 50/50 is the only fair option at this point. Take it or leave it.
